title: Lynda - Up and Running with VMware NSX
description:
Lynda - Up and Running with VMware NSX

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 52m Intermediate Jan 04, 2016   | Uploaded in Jan 15, 2016 by 2boweb

Subject:  IT 
Software: NSX 
Author:  Bill Ferguson 
 
Software-defined networking is the next "big thing" in IT virtualization, and being able to administer an SDN will be a key skill for any IT professional. NSX is VMware's SDN platform, and this course will show how to get it up and running.â€¨â€¨VMware Certified Instructor Bill Ferguson covers the basics of NSX (including NSX components) and techniques for creating a software-defined data center. He shows how to configure a controller cluster, prepare hosts for VXLAN networking, and configure logical switches and distributed routers. Later in the course, Bill configures static and OSPF routing, load balancing, and a simple VPN, as well as high availability with NSX Edge. By the end of the training, viewers should be able to use NSX on top of their existing network resources to improve performance, deploy services, and increase securityâ€”without any additional hardware.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Overview of virtual networks and NSX components
	â€¢	Configuring controller clusters, logical switches, and distributed routers
	â€¢	Following packet flow with a DLR
	â€¢	Understanding Layer 2 bridging
	â€¢	Configuring static and OSPF routing
	â€¢	Understanding SNAT and DNAT
	â€¢	Configuring load balancing
	â€¢	Configuring high availability on NSX Edge
